Document.summary: Partial ordering item sorter. This class sorts items in a partial order using the given dependency information. Node stored in this class using the index of items. If a depends on b, then a.ins->Contains(b) && b.outs->Contains(a). The sorting result is a list of strong connected components in order. If a depends on b, then the component containing a appears after the component containing b. Node could represent a sub class if InitWithSubClass is called.
